title: Nicorinse
text: Nicorinse is a brand of <a href="mouthwash">mouthwash</a> formulated to help users <a href="Smoking%20cessation">quit smoking</a> <a href="cigarettes">cigarettes</a>. It was invented by <a href="William%20Anthony%20Farone">Dr. William Farone</a>. Nicorinse is formulated to reduce the presence and residue of tobacco chemicals in the mouth, including <a href="nicotine">nicotine</a>. Nicorinse was originally launched in <a href="North%20America">North America</a>, then in the <a href="United%20Kingdom">United Kingdom</a> in February 2015. Compared to other smoking prevention products, it is notable for not containing nicotine.
